resources.string: - On a Home screen, hold an empty space. \n- Tap Widgets section. \n- Find a Divergence widget. Hold it then move and scale wherever you want.

If you are running a Samsung, you can get GoodLock LockStar to add the widget to the lock and always on display screens. For other android devices you can try buying Lockscreen Widgets and Drawer, but this app has not been tested with it.
*Widgets will try to resize to fit the adjustable border
